phone.description: Home/work/mobile phone number. We’ll try to parse the number using libphonenumber.

username.description: Username/screen-name, minimum 3 characters. There’s an advanced option to search by username or user-id at a specific service like superman@facebook.

user_id.description: Unique ID in a supported service, must include the service name.

url.description: Profile URL in a supported service. This URL will be parsed to a username or user_id object.

raw_name.description: Full Name. Use this parameter if the accurate name parts (first/middle/last) are not available, this parameter will only be used in absence of first_name and last_name.

country.description: A two-letter, Alpha-2 ISO-3166 country code.

state.description: A United States, Canada, Great Britain or Australia state code. If a US state is provided and no country specified, we’ll assume the country to be US.

raw_address.description: Full Address. Use this parameter if the accurate address parts (country/state/city…) are not available.

age.description: String, an exact (YY) or approximate (YY-YY) age.
